amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an exception from the provisions of the bill for pay equity lawsuits arising from the Civil Rights Act or the Equal Pay Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 224 (Roll no. 27).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 224 (Roll no. 27).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Moore.
